titleStmt.title: The bruised reede, and smoaking flax Some sermons contracted out of the 12. of Matth. 20. At the desire, and for the good of weaker Christians. By R. Sibbes. D.D.
titleStmt.author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by M. Flesher] for R. Dawlman, dwelling at the signe of the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Page numbers 63-72 are repeated in page numbering.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
